messages.title: Higher Heating Bills - Thanks to Government Policy
messages.content: Colder weather means having to put the heating on. Thanks to government policy, we are all paying far more to heat our homes.

messages.title: A Message From Pete Reeve
messages.content: Dear Neighbour, I have been working extremely hard for you fighting against the worst excesses of Conservatives and Labour, working hard to achieve tax fairness, better safer roads, keeping the lights on and stopping over development of our beautiful countryside.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pete fights for better, safer roads and protection for our countryside.
Pete is committed to defending the government's unfair overdevelopment policy which is destroying our community and concreting over our countryside.
Pete believes in you keeping your tax. Your money is better off in your pocket instead of in the council and government coffers.

issues.economy: Working hard to achieve tax fairness.
issues.environment: Colder weather increases heating bills due to government policy. Keeping the lights on and stopping over development of our beautiful countryside.
issues.health: Standing up to proposals to privatise the NHS.

housing.content: Standing up against over development damaging our community.
